# OmicSignature

### last update
11/22/2020

### installation
`devtools::install_github(repo = "Vanessa104/OmicSignature")`  

### description
R6 object OmicSignature and OmicSignatureCollection to store high-throughput experiment yield signaturess.  
See vignettes [https://vanessa104.github.io/omicsignature/].  

### development notes

Run `devtools::build_vignettes()` to build vig.
